no_idb: IndexedDB failed to initialize on your browser, this may be due to you being on a private window or your browser straight up not supporting it. Any changes you make on this screen WILL NOT BE PERSISTED.
display_performance_show_stats_desc:
Displays performance stats on the top-right corner of the screen. 

Current stats: FPS
graphics_post_effects_ssao_desc: Screen Space Ambient Occlusion: Darkens objects close to each other or faces at close angles, emulating how light would be occluded.
graphics_post_effects_bloom_desc: Blurs really bright spots, emulating how light would interact with a camera.
graphics_post_effects_taa_desc: Temporal Anti Aliasing: Softens aliased and pixelated edges, making the final render smoother.
game_loading_cache_assets_desc:
Stores loaded assets locally, speeding up the loading process at the expense of some storage. 

Current storage being used: <USAGE> by <ASSET_NO> <ASSET_PLURAL>. 

Please note that this usage may also include the game's configuration and other things your browser saves about this website.
